name: VoidWorld
description:
Renowned and beloved by all video entertainment visionary Liam Kneesock's most ambitious project yet!

VoidWorld features a cast of 6(!) charming characters, that's a whooping 20%(!) increase in charming characters from earlier masterwork Garfpg! 

It's also professor Kneesock's first Open World project with a whole 5(!) lovely locations to visit and explore(!)! 

If that wasn't enough the game also simulates the rotation of the earth by featuring a night and day cycle!

Still not sold on it? Beyond character art, backgrounds, and effects, the game has 19 unique and beautiful CGs (Computer graphics(!)) which is probably more than Sir Kneesock's other games but he hasn't counted so he's not 100%(!) sure!

VoidWorld is a game where you take control of a protagonist designed by expert scientists for ideal self-insertion! No more troublesome skin to crawl into or loud personalities to be threatened by!!! Try to charm all five of the lovely and beautiful characters to unlock a super special and very secret additional ending!!! Tired of games only letting you try to date girls? Voidworld allows you to attempt to get with girls, boys, or a jellyfish if that's your thing!?

The most amazing part? Unlike Mr. Kneesock's other games you can actually pay for this one (if you want to (please do(!)))!

Prepare yourself to enter a delicatly crafted and stunningly colourful word dreamt up by the game director of game directors himself!

THIS GAME CONTAINS ADULT THEMES AND IS NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN

IT HAS NAUGHTY WORDS IN IT AND STUFF

NO NUDITY THOUGH SO PLAY IT AT WORK DUDE AND TWEET PICS OF YOU PLAYING IT AT WORK TO OWN YOUR BOSS LMAO

I am sorry if there are bug.
